revision.text: === Parameters === *{{c|bool '''allaround'''}} :If true, the actor will look for targets all around them, ignoring the {{c|fov}} field in LookExParams. *{{c|LookexParams '''params'''}} :A '''{{struct|LookExParams}}''' struct with values that will determine the function's behavior. === Return value === *bool â€” Returns true if a target was successfully found. The actor's target [[Actor pointers|pointer]] will be updated to point to the found target.
